articles.title: Droupadi Murmu Swearing-in Live: Honoured to take charge as President as India completes 75 years of Independence, says Murmu

articles.title: Uttar Pradesh: Double-decker buses collide on Purvanchal Expressway, 8 dead
articles.description: Efforts are on to identify the dead, the ASP said, adding the injured have been admitted to a local hospital from where the seriously injured are being referred to a trauma centre in Lucknow.

articles.title: Droupadi Murmu likely to wear traditional Santhali attire for oath-taking ceremony
